title: Looking for a free font similar to old western font
content:
Hello,

I'm looking for a free font that resembles the font in the picture. WhatTheFont?! came up with Kyhota Barbed, which is close, but commercial.

Thanks!

Pieter

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [meet\_me\_still.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100409151841/http:/typophile.com/files/meet_me_still.jpg) | 54.72 KB |
author: Pieter den Hollander

comments.content:
Cibola is close

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/scriptorium/cibola/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100409151841/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/scriptorium/cibola/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/scriptorium/cibola/")

but not free, can't help ya there. Altho $12 is pretty cheap. For free try Dafont.
[De Louisville](http://web.archive.org/web/20100409151841/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sentinel/de-louisville/) maybe works? It's not that close, but free...

Thanks a lot! Abilene will do the job.

P
